snippet: The Hawks’ president, Bob Williams, said a letter to potential ticket buyers promoting Atlanta’s chances of signing Chris Paul and Dwight Howard was an “unfortunate” mistake.
lead_paragraph: The Hawks’ president, Bob Williams, said a letter to potential ticket buyers promoting Atlanta’s chances of signing Chris Paul and Dwight Howard was an “unfortunate” mistake.

headline.main: Hawks’ Letter Is Called a Mistake
headline.print_headline: Hawks’ Letter Is Called a Mistake
